taskDetails.title: Create E2E test for backfill worker updating existing data

implementation.approach: Created comprehensive E2E test suite for backfill worker functionality
keyFeatures: Test: Create conversation with NULL participant_username
Test: Trigger backfill worker via API endpoint
Test: Verify conversation updated with participant profile
Test: Verify participant_username is no longer NULL
Test: Handle multiple conversations in batch
Test: Handle empty backfill scenario gracefully

scenarios: Create conversation with NULL participant data
Trigger backfill and verify profile update
Verify profile picture populated after backfill

technicalDecisions: Used Playwright test framework for E2E testing consistency
Used axios for direct HTTP API calls to backend
Implemented cleanup in afterEach hook to remove test data
Added proper error handling with detailed error messages
Used environment variables for test account configuration
Added timeout configuration for long-running operations
Implemented delays to allow worker processing time

testResults.note: E2E tests created and ready for execution. Tests require backend to be running with proper Instagram API configuration.

codeReviewNotes: Uses camelCase for variables and functions
Proper error handling with try-catch blocks

checkpoints.requirement: E2E test file created for backfill worker
Test: create conversation with NULL participant_username
checkpoints.evidence: Test case 'should create conversation with NULL participant_username' implemented
Test case 'should trigger backfill worker and update conversation with participant profile' implemented

checkpoints.requirement: Test: verify conversation updated with participant profile
checkpoints.evidence: Verification logic included in backfill test case

checkpoints.requirement: Test: verify participant_username is no longer NULL
checkpoints.evidence: Test case 'should verify participant_username is no longer NULL after backfill' implemented
Test case 'should verify participant_profile_pic is populated after backfill' implemented
Tests created and ready for execution when backend is available

nextSteps: Run E2E tests with backend and Instagram API configured
Monitor backfill worker performance with real data
